ygData.subject: Re: Accelerando table update
ygData.msgSnippet: Other than the names, both the lute and the battle drum appear exactly the same as their contemporary counterparts. Same animation and item graphic.
ygData.messageBody:
Other than the names, both the lute and the battle drum appear exactly the same as
their contemporary counterparts. Same animation and item graphic.

>
> >I have the drum as well. Here's hard facts on the Mistmoore Battle Drum - same
> >weight (0.5) as a hand drum,
>
> Does it have the same inventory graphic? Does it suffer from the same
> (silly, frustrating, unacknowledged) confusion with the flute graphic that
> we see when it's on the ground or in your hand?
>
